title: My account is hacked
body: This account is hacked. the person(s) didn't know I assume that i'm logged in through my computer, and phone. Says I purchased $200 worth of riot points through my paypal(called my bank and blocked charges) and that I transfered... So I can't log in to the game client cause I can't find which server. already have sent a support ticket.

replies.body: We definitely want to look into this and see what's going on, as well as help with restoring access to your account.  Did you send a ticket through your account or an [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416)?  I'd recommend using the form, as it won't require you to login, which will prevent any push back from an unauthorized user.  I'm glad you were able to take some action on this, and we'll tag in to help too as soon as we can.
did that. just waiting on response.
any word on it, or on response times?

I looked into your ticket and see that a specialist did receive it!  He's been investigating your case and working towards getting everything back in order.  It can take a little bit longer if reparations are needed.  Your ticket is in good hands and you'll get a reply back asap.  In the meantime, please stop spamming other threads as it can scare other players in similar situations.  Don't worry, we'll take care of you just hang tight.
I was able to verify that your ticket was successfully received.  It's been escalated to our account recovery team, and a specialist will grab your case as soon as they can.  Hang tight!
OMG they attempted to use a Gamil to link to my email. I then took over the gmail they created and now have the phone number they listed for recovery. it's from serbia.
Any update porocles? I'm worried that they might be fighting to get my account too.  Seriously wish yall had a phone number to call.
